name: Fain
description:
Fain is a short Puzzle Game where you have to Fail and learn from your mistakes to Win.

The game consists of 9 Levels and a Tutorial.

Important: If you ever want to reset the Level just press "ctrl + shift + x" !!!

Controlls:

  • You can place Waypoints by pressing "shift + right mouse"
  • You can delete Waypoints by pressing "shift + left mouse"
  • You can drag around your Waypoints (It might happen that you cant move the Waypoint if it is at the same position as the Player. Try grabbing an outer edge of the Waypoint that is not intersecting with the Player)
  • You can create a Waypoint after the one your hovering by pressing "ctrl + right mouse"
  • You can create a Waypoint before the one your hovering by pressing "ctrl + left mouse"
  • Start the Level with Space - Stop it with ESC
